ru.cos.sim.road.objects
Interface RectangleRoadObject

All Superinterfaces:
Point, RoadObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
Vehicle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRectangleRoadObject, AbstractVehicle, BlockRoadObject, RegularVehicle
public interface RectangleRoadObject
extends RoadObject

Rectangle road object with length and width. Length is measured to the lengthy direction, width measured perpendicularly to the lengthy.

Author:
zroslaw
